Package store.business.util.transaction

Class Transaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • store.business.util.transaction.Transaction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Model<MalformedTransactionParameterException>
    public class Transaction
extends java.lang.Object
implements Model<MalformedTransactionParameterException>

    The transaction object

    A transaction is an object that has:

  • A client UID
  • A product UID
  • A number of product
  • A date

Since:
1.0.0
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Raphael Dray
See Also:
Logger, Date, SimpleDateFormat
